mapper.select: select * from user_tb as u join order_tb as o on o.id = u.id join product_tb as p on p.id = o.product_id where u.id=#{id};
mapper.insert: insert into user_tb (username, password, tel, address, email, first_name, last_name) values( #{username}, #{password}, #{tel}, #{address},#{email},#{firstName},#{lastName} );
